name: Fizzy Popups | Fastest Popups Builder (With Elementor Widget)
author: Light Plugins

sections.description:
It is often found very difficult to set up a popup.Most of the time user can’t show what they want to show in the popup.For that reason we introduce Fizzy Popups.Using it you can show what you want to show and how you want to show in the popup.
You can customize everything!! You can Organize your popups like your dreams!! In a Sentence, You can implement your imagination to reality using Fizzy Popups.

Why Fizzy Popups ?

  • Fastest Fizzy Popups Builder is the Fastest Popups builder.
  • Simplest Simple to set up.
  • Lightweight No unused assets loads. Assets size is just 10kb.
  • Organized The plugin is well Organized to set up a new popup.
  • Live Preview You can edit and show live preview.
  • Elementor Widget It has Elementor Widget to show popups.
sections.faq:
Is The Fizzy Popups customizable?

Yes, You can customize everything of the Fizzy Popups.

Is Fizzy Popups allow to design popups?

Yes, You can design your popup from editor panel the way you want to show the users.

Does it Elementor Compatible?

Yes, It is Elementor Compatible.
sections.changelog:
1.2.1 (DATE: JULY 10, 2021)

  • More Customized Css Load in frontend (Load css more faster)
  • Fix Button Css Issue

1.2.0 (DATE: JULY 04, 2021)

  • Added Elementor Widget
  • Added Bulk Delete Option

1.1.0 (DATE: JUNE 25, 2021)

  • Added Blank Popup Layout
  • Added Html to each Layout
  • Added Popup Margin Settings
  • Fix Button Url Field
  • Show/Hide specific component

= 1.0.0 (DATE: JUNE 05, 2021)=

  • Launched the Fizzy Popups!

short_description: Display clean, customizable, and responsive Popups To Your Wordpress Site.
